'''1.4.23'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167351|title=Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - 1.4|date=March 21, 2018}}</ref> is an update for the {{el|ds}} released on March 21&ndash;22, 2018, which added 2-player local multiplayer and fixed bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''Multiplayer'''
* Added support for 2 player [[multiplayer]] using Local Play.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Improved stability and performance.

== Fixes ==
* Numerous bug fixes from previous builds.
